_description: On the Old Testament worthies — seven monorhyming lines

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Abel wes looset in treunesseHabraham in
                    bousumnesse…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…dauid þe kinc hede reunesseJob þe gode
                    þolemodnesse
CamTCC323.Note:
Preceded by the Latin equivalent. ‘Iam innocenciam abel
                    audiui…’.
CamTCC323.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 25.
